title: ElmonX Unveils ‘The Scream’ NFTs by Edvard Munch For The First Time Ever - Chainwire
description: London, United Kingdom, February 26th, 2024, Chainwire Launching on OpenSea.io 1st March at 9AM PT ElmonX is proud to announced of the upcoming release of ‘The Scream’ by Edvard Munch. ElmonX, the digital collectibles platform, has unveiled a collaboration to launch one unique drop licensed by Bridgeman Images. The Scream, 1895 (litho), Munch, Edvard (1863–1944)
